entities.name: ce dric
entities.description: Cedric's voice is heard yelling in response to Harry's actions. He is the one who is being yelled at by Harry.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum's voice is heard shouting 'Crucio!' which causes Cedric to yell in pain.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is trying to find a way into Cedric's house and is using magic to try and get through the hedge.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is the one whose house Harry is trying to get into. He is also the one who is being yelled at by Harry.

entities.name: reductor curse
entities.description: The Reductor Curse is a spell that Harry uses in an attempt to break through the hedge.

entities.name: hedge
entities.description: The hedge is an obstacle that Harry has to get through to reach Cedric's house.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to find a way into Cedric's house, but the hedge is blocking his path. He uses magic to try and get through it.
Harry uses the Reductor Curse in an attempt to break through the hedge, but it is not very effective.
Krum's voice shouting 'Crucio!' causes Cedric to yell in pain.
